about_the_game:
The town is in crisis due to an attack by the ghouls
Please take a variety of strategies to defeat ghouls and keep your town safe
This game is a build-based defense game where you have to mine resources to build up a town and train soldiers to stop the invading ghouls.
You can upgrade various abilities to make your units more powerful.


Units :
1. King - This giant creature has great strength and versatility, but you have to be very careful because if you die, all your allies will lose their lives accordingly.
2. Destroyer - This is key unit for flame in land war and kill all of target ghoul surrounding by
3. Warrior - These warriors lead the way and are able to withstand tremendous damage with their solid armor and shields.
4. Archer - It has tremendous firepower to keep focusing on destroying your targets with your distance
5. Wizard - It supports your ally units using your magic-filled wand


Buildings :
1. Necropolis - It is a key building where it is possible to produce own troops and all buildings can be built, and it must be kept safe from being destroyed by the target of the ghouls.
2. Haunted Gold Mine - Extract pumpkin-Gold from the depths of the underground tomb. If you upgrade it, it will increase the yield of Pumpkin-Gold (9600 per hour)
3. Ziggurat - It is a building that is the place for supplying food, and each ziggurat supplies a total of 24 food. If you upgrade it, you will get more supplies.
4. Spirit Tower - It is a defensive building that protects the town with a very long attack range and powerful firepower
5. Altar of Darkness - You can enhance the King's various abilities. Enhance it to a higher level through upgrades.
6. Hell's Forge - You can enhance the various abilities of the Warrior and improve your abilities to a higher level through upgrades
7. Cursed Oracle - You can enhance the various abilities of the Archer and upgrade it to a higher level
8. Witch's Cauldron - You can enhance the various abilities of the Wizard. Enhance it to a higher level through upgrades.
